entry.string: If you wish to show the title for the article check this box.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo veesh tu shoo zee teetle-a fur zee erteecle-a check thees bux.

entry.string: If you wish to show the author for the article check this box.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo veesh tu shoo zee oothur fur zee erteecle-a check thees bux.

entry.string: If you wish to show the publication date for the article check this box.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo veesh tu shoo zee poobleeceshun dete-a fur zee erteecle-a check thees bux.

entry.string: If you wish to show a link for new article submissions check this box.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo veesh tu shoo a leenk fur noo erteecle-a soobmeessiuns check thees bux.
